pages.sourcesIntro: This project uses the official RK Wiki as the single source of truth. List below shows what was used.
pages.aboutBody: This site is an unofficial fan-made utility. It is not affiliated with Renaissance Kingdoms, Celsius Online, or any publisher. Trademarks and game content belong to their respective owners.
pages.privacyBody: We do not require accounts. We may store your language preference in localStorage/cookies. If AdSense is enabled, Google may set cookies and collect data for ads personalization according to Google's policies.
pages.cookiesBody: We use a locale cookie to remember your chosen language. If AdSense is enabled, additional cookies may be set by Google.

hunger.title: Hunger & Diet
hunger.roleAdvanced: Middle class / Scholar after choosing a path (> level 100) (3 points)
hunger.tipHealth: If you don't eat enough, your health state drops the next day (rules differ below/above level 100).

fields.title: Fields (Corn/Wheat)
fields.yieldPending: Yield ranges include "??" in the Wiki article — numeric yield calculator is PENDING.
fields.cornDay1: Day 1: Put a bag of corn in property inventory; plough & sow (22h / 100 AP).
fields.wheatDay1: Day 1: Put a bag of wheat in property inventory; plough & sow (22h / 100 AP).

pigs.title: Pig Field
pigs.grass: Grass (free): 5/18 chance to gain weight per day
pigs.corn: One bag of corn per pig: 5/9 chance to gain weight per day
pigs.note15: Second field yield is reduced by 15%.

trust.title: Trust & Reputation
trust.base: Base: 2 trust points/week (Sunday 5:00 PM → next Sunday 5:00 PM)
trust.cha: As charisma increases, weekly trust giving increases too (max 5 at charisma 255).
trust.receivableTitle: Max trust points receivable (depends on level)
trust.lvl3: Level III: ≥ 5 reputation points (max can be from 3 trust points)
trust.lvl4: Level IV: ≥ 15 reputation points (max can be from 8 trust points)
trust.lvl5: Level V: ≥ 35 reputation points (max can be from 17 trust points)
trust.lvl6: Level VI: ≥ 100 reputation points (max can be from 30 trust points)
trust.max255: Maximum reputation points possible is 255 (includes trust points).
